text:
Bolsonaro wants India to be Lord Hanuman to deliever the medicinal mountain (#chloroquine) to Bolsonaro as Lord Ram to help save Brazilians as Lord Laksman in his fight with #Covid_19 as evil Ravaana...
So Bolsonaro just wrote down the epic novel Ramayaana 2.0 on Hanuman Jayanti. https://t.co/btDx91qeR0
